mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY free_no DESC) rnum, free_no, user_no, free_title, free_writer, free_content, free_cnt, TO_CHAR(free_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS free_date FROM freeboard WHERE 1=1 AND (free_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR free_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) T WHERE T.rnum BETWEEN (#{page} * #{itemsPerPage}) - (#{itemsPerPage} - 1) AND (#{page} * #{itemsPerPage})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeboard WHERE 1=1 AND (free_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR free_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
SELECT free_no, user_no, free_title, free_writer, free_content, free_cnt, TO_CHAR(free_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS free_date FROM freeboard WHERE free_no = #{freeNo}

SELECT free_no, user_no, free_title, free_writer, free_content, free_cnt, TO_CHAR(free_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS free_date FROM freeboard WHERE free_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR free_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (free_no, user_no, free_title, free_writer, free_content, free_cnt, free_date) VALUES ('FREE_' || seq_freeboard.nextval, #{userNo}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeWriter}, #{freeContent}, 0, sysdate)
INSERT INTO FREE_COMMENT (fc_no, free_no, user_no, fc_content, fc_writer, fc_date) VALUES ('FREE_' ||seq_freecomment.nextval, #{freeNo}, #{userNo}, #{fcContent}, '익명', sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT fc_no, free_no, user_no, fc_content, fc_writer, TO_CHAR(fc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS fc_date FROM FREE_COMMENT WHERE free_no = #{freeNo} ORDER BY fc_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_COMMENT SET fc_content = #{fcContent}, fc_date = sysdate WHERE fc_no = #{fcNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
UPDATE freeboard SET free_title = #{freeTitle}, free_content = #{freeContent}, free_date = sysdate WHERE free_no = #{freeNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM freeboard WHERE free_no = #{freeNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Report (REP_NO, USER_NO, REP_REASON, REP_DATE, BOARD_PK_NO, COM_DET_X_NO) VALUES (report_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{repReason}, SYSDATE, #{boardPkNo}, #{comDetxNo})
